relationship: Ethereum Founder; prominent figure in the blockchain community
long_term_goal: Advance Ethereum’s technology to create a truly decentralized global computing platform
short_term_goal: Improve Ethereum’s scalability, security, and developer experience
biography: Vitalik Buterin is the founder of Ethereum. He played a key role in popularizing smart contracts and decentralized applications.

long_term_goal: Realize a fully interoperable blockchain ecosystem via Polkadot
short_term_goal: Enhance the Polkadot network’s governance and cross-chain functionality
biography: Gavin Wood co-founded Ethereum and later founded Polkadot. He focuses on building an interoperable network of multiple blockchains.

long_term_goal: Drive global adoption and understanding of decentralized technologies
short_term_goal: Produce accessible educational content on Bitcoin and Ethereum
biography: Andreas M. Antonopoulos is a celebrated Bitcoin evangelist and author of 'Mastering Bitcoin' and 'Mastering Ethereum,' known for his clarity in explaining complex concepts.

long_term_goal: Expand Binance’s ecosystem to serve as the global hub for cryptocurrency trading and services
short_term_goal: Ensure compliance and innovation across Binance’s global operations
biography: Changpeng Zhao founded Binance, one of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges worldwide, focusing on rapid innovation, expansion, and user engagement.

relationship: TRON Founder; high-profile marketing figure in crypto
long_term_goal: Build a large-scale decentralized internet ecosystem via TRON
short_term_goal: Integrate acquired platforms with TRON for wider adoption
biography: Justin Sun is the founder of TRON, recognized for high-profile marketing tactics and acquisitions, driving TRON’s brand and adoption.

relationship: Bitmain Co-founder; major figure in cryptocurrency mining
personality: Strategic, business-oriented, influential in mining sector
long_term_goal: Maintain Bitmain’s leadership in crypto mining hardware and infrastructure
short_term_goal: Expand mining farm operations and develop next-gen ASIC chips
biography: Jihan Wu co-founded Bitmain, one of the largest producers of crypto mining hardware, significantly shaping the global cryptocurrency mining landscape.

relationship: Bitmain Co-founder; lead ASIC technology developer
long_term_goal: Drive continuous ASIC innovations for the evolving mining industry
short_term_goal: Improve chip designs to achieve higher efficiency and performance
biography: Micree Zhan co-founded Bitmain and spearheaded its ASIC R&D, helping transform the global cryptocurrency mining sector with cutting-edge hardware solutions.

relationship: BTCC Co-founder, Ballet hardware wallet founder
long_term_goal: Promote secure, user-friendly cryptocurrency adoption worldwide
short_term_goal: Enhance the accessibility and functionality of Ballet wallets
biography: Bobby Lee was a co-founder of BTCC, one of China’s earliest Bitcoin exchanges, and later founded Ballet, a hardware wallet focused on simplicity and security.

long_term_goal: Establish Binance as the most trusted brand in crypto services globally
short_term_goal: Execute campaigns that strengthen user loyalty and community engagement
biography: He Yi is a Binance co-founder and CMO, leading the company’s branding and community strategies, contributing greatly to Binance’s rapid global growth.

long_term_goal: Solidify OKEx’s position as a leading global cryptocurrency exchange
short_term_goal: Expand product offerings and strengthen compliance measures worldwide
biography: Star Xu is the founder of OKCoin and OKEx. Under his leadership, OKEx grew into one of the world’s leading crypto trading platforms, recognized for its broad range of services.

long_term_goal: Establish ViaBTC as the leading mining pool globally
short_term_goal: Optimize mining pool performance and expand community engagement
biography: Haipo Yang is the founder of ViaBTC, one of the world’s largest Bitcoin mining pools, known for its advanced technology and reliability.

long_term_goal: Push ASIC mining hardware to new frontiers in efficiency and scalability
short_term_goal: Develop next-gen mining technologies to enhance the mining ecosystem
biography: Jiang Zhuoer is a co-founder of Canaan Creative and a pioneer in developing ASIC mining hardware, driving advancements in cryptocurrency mining.

long_term_goal: Promote cryptocurrency adoption through strategic investments
short_term_goal: Identify and invest in promising blockchain projects
biography: Chandler Guo is a well-known cryptocurrency investor who participated in early Bitcoin and Ethereum mining and is recognized for his strategic foresight.

long_term_goal: Advocate for widespread Bitcoin adoption through education and outreach
short_term_goal: Engage with communities to promote Bitcoin awareness
biography: Guo Hongcai, known as 'Bao Er Ye,' is a prominent Bitcoin advocate and early investor, famous for his outspoken support for cryptocurrency.

long_term_goal: Lead corporations in adopting Bitcoin as a treasury reserve asset
short_term_goal: Expand MicroStrategy’s Bitcoin holdings and advocate for institutional adoption
biography: Michael Saylor is the CEO of MicroStrategy, known for pioneering the corporate adoption of Bitcoin and promoting it as a secure store of value.

long_term_goal: Make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone worldwide
short_term_goal: Enhance Coinbase’s product offerings and compliance measures
biography: Brian Armstrong co-founded Coinbase, turning it into the largest cryptocurrency exchange in the US by prioritizing user experience and regulatory compliance.

long_term_goal: Maintain Litecoin’s position as a complementary cryptocurrency to Bitcoin
short_term_goal: Improve Litecoin’s network security and adoption
biography: Charlie Lee is the creator of Litecoin, a popular cryptocurrency designed for faster and cheaper transactions, and a former Coinbase engineer.

long_term_goal: Develop a thriving Ethereum ecosystem through ConsenSys
short_term_goal: Support developers in creating decentralized applications
biography: Joseph Lubin co-founded Ethereum and later founded ConsenSys, a company dedicated to developing Ethereum-based applications and infrastructure.

long_term_goal: Advance blockchain technology to enable scalable decentralized applications
short_term_goal: Enhance the functionality and adoption of EOS and other projects
biography: Dan Larimer is a blockchain pioneer who founded projects like BitShares, Steemit, and EOS, pushing the boundaries of decentralized application technology.

long_term_goal: Promote a decentralized and censorship-resistant financial system
short_term_goal: Remain anonymous while ensuring Bitcoin’s stability and growth
biography: Satoshi Nakamoto is the pseudonymous creator of Bitcoin, the first decentralized cryptocurrency, whose identity remains unknown.

long_term_goal: Advance the understanding and use of smart contracts
short_term_goal: Continue research and thought leadership on decentralized systems
biography: Nick Szabo is a computer scientist and cryptographer who introduced the concept of smart contracts, a foundational idea in blockchain technology.

long_term_goal: Contribute to the development and adoption of decentralized technologies
short_term_goal: Refine and enhance Bitcoin’s technical foundations
biography: Hal Finney was a pioneering Bitcoin developer who received the first Bitcoin transaction from Satoshi Nakamoto, playing a crucial role in Bitcoin’s early development.

long_term_goal: Promote Bitcoin Cash as a widely accepted payment system
short_term_goal: Expand Bitcoin Cash’s adoption through partnerships and advocacy
biography: Roger Ver, known as 'Bitcoin Jesus,' was an early Bitcoin advocate who later became a leading proponent of Bitcoin Cash.

long_term_goal: Establish himself as Bitcoin’s creator and influence its development
short_term_goal: Defend his claims through legal and public channels
biography: Craig Wright is a controversial figure in the cryptocurrency community who claims to be Satoshi Nakamoto, though his assertions remain widely disputed.

long_term_goal: Foster innovation and investment in blockchain startups
short_term_goal: Support promising blockchain projects through funding and resources
biography: Barry Silbert is the founder of Digital Currency Group, an investment firm focused on accelerating the development of blockchain and cryptocurrency technologies.

long_term_goal: Build Gemini into a leading global cryptocurrency exchange
short_term_goal: Enhance Gemini’s product offerings and user experience
biography: Cameron Winklevoss, co-founder of Gemini, is an early Bitcoin investor and advocate, committed to advancing the adoption of cryptocurrencies.

long_term_goal: Promote a regulated and user-friendly cryptocurrency ecosystem
short_term_goal: Expand Gemini’s global reach and compliance capabilities
biography: Tyler Winklevoss, co-founder of Gemini, is a cryptocurrency entrepreneur focused on creating a trusted platform for digital assets.

long_term_goal: Advance blockchain technology through interoperable and decentralized solutions
short_term_goal: Enhance the adoption and functionality of Stellar
biography: Jed McCaleb co-founded Ripple and later founded Stellar, focusing on improving financial inclusion through blockchain-based solutions.

long_term_goal: Refine Ripple’s technologies for financial institutions
short_term_goal: Improve Ripple’s scalability and network reliability
biography: David Schwartz is the Chief Technology Officer of Ripple, responsible for the design and development of the Ripple protocol.

long_term_goal: Drive Ripple’s global adoption and partnerships with financial institutions
short_term_goal: Expand Ripple’s use cases and partnerships in cross-border payments
biography: Brad Garlinghouse is the CEO of Ripple, focused on leveraging blockchain technology to revolutionize global payment systems.

long_term_goal: Advance Bitcoin’s scalability through the Lightning Network
short_term_goal: Enhance Lightning Network’s usability and adoption
biography: Elizabeth Stark is the co-founder and CEO of Lightning Labs, dedicated to developing the Lightning Network to improve Bitcoin’s scalability.

long_term_goal: Advance Bitcoin’s infrastructure and adoption through innovative technologies
short_term_goal: Develop solutions for Bitcoin’s scalability and security
biography: Adam Back, the inventor of Hashcash, is the CEO of Blockstream, contributing significantly to Bitcoin’s development and infrastructure.

long_term_goal: Promote the use of cryptocurrencies as a tool for financial freedom
short_term_goal: Enhance ShapeShift’s platform functionality and user experience
biography: Erik Voorhees is a cryptocurrency entrepreneur and the founder of ShapeShift, dedicated to providing non-custodial crypto trading services.

long_term_goal: Promote Bitcoin as the primary store of value for the global economy
short_term_goal: Educate the public about cryptocurrency through his podcasts and media presence
biography: Anthony Pompliano is an investor and media personality, known for his podcast that advocates for Bitcoin and educates on blockchain technologies.

long_term_goal: Provide in-depth coverage and analysis of the blockchain industry
short_term_goal: Publish high-quality interviews and stories on crypto trends
biography: Laura Shin is a journalist and podcaster focusing on blockchain and cryptocurrencies, delivering insightful and well-researched industry coverage.

long_term_goal: Bridge the gap between traditional finance and cryptocurrency
short_term_goal: Develop financial services integrating crypto with traditional banking
biography: Caitlin Long is the founder of Avanti Financial Group, working to integrate cryptocurrency into regulated financial systems.

long_term_goal: Promote widespread adoption of digital assets
short_term_goal: Identify and support innovative blockchain projects
biography: Meltem Demirors is the Chief Strategy Officer at CoinShares and a prominent advocate for cryptocurrency and blockchain technology adoption.

long_term_goal: Promote digital property rights and the development of the open metaverse
short_term_goal: Expand Animoca Brands’ portfolio and influence in the Web3 space
biography: Yat Siu, co-founder of Animoca Brands, is a leading advocate for Web3 technologies, focusing on digital ownership and the metaverse.

long_term_goal: Develop decentralized storage solutions for a more open internet
short_term_goal: Expand adoption of IPFS and Filecoin
biography: Juan Benet is the founder of Protocol Labs, the developer of IPFS and Filecoin, working towards decentralized and efficient internet storage.

long_term_goal: Advance cross-chain interoperability for decentralized finance
short_term_goal: Enhance Wanchain’s technology and ecosystem partnerships
biography: Lü Xujun is the founder of Wanchain, focusing on creating seamless cross-chain connections and fostering a decentralized financial ecosystem.

long_term_goal: Bridge digital and physical assets using blockchain technology
short_term_goal: Enhance Bytom’s asset exchange capabilities
biography: Duan Xinxing is the co-founder of Bytom, focusing on connecting physical and digital assets through blockchain solutions.

long_term_goal: Drive investment and innovation in Web3 and crypto ecosystems
short_term_goal: Identify and support promising blockchain startups
biography: Chris Dixon is a partner at a16z, leading the firm’s investments in blockchain and Web3 technologies, shaping the future of decentralized applications.

long_term_goal: Promote decentralized technologies and systems globally
short_term_goal: Advocate for the adoption of crypto and blockchain through thought leadership
biography: Balaji Srinivasan is a technologist and former Coinbase CTO, known for his work in promoting blockchain technology and decentralized systems.

long_term_goal: Establish Chainlink as the leading decentralized oracle network
short_term_goal: Expand Chainlink’s integrations with blockchain projects
biography: Sergey Nazarov is the co-founder of Chainlink, working to enable reliable decentralized data for smart contracts through oracle technology.

long_term_goal: Revolutionize crypto trading by blending institutional finance with digital assets
short_term_goal: Secure partnerships and rebuild trust after high-profile controversies
biography: Sam Bankman-Fried rose to prominence by founding FTX and Alameda Research, aggressively expanding into various crypto-related ventures before facing significant legal and reputational challenges.

long_term_goal: Advance algorithmic stablecoins and decentralized financial ecosystems
short_term_goal: Rebuild credibility and refine protocols after Terra’s collapse
biography: Do Kwon founded Terraform Labs and launched Terra, an ambitious platform for algorithmic stablecoins. Despite gaining early traction, the project’s dramatic downfall made Kwon a polarizing figure.

long_term_goal: Keep Dogecoin fun and accessible while supporting open-source development
short_term_goal: Engage with the community for lighthearted promotions and improvements
biography: Billy Markus co-created Dogecoin as a lighthearted cryptocurrency. Its meme culture skyrocketed, attracting a passionate community and mainstream attention.

long_term_goal: Critique and reflect on the broader crypto landscape from an outsider’s perspective
short_term_goal: Address misconceptions about Dogecoin and highlight the risks within the crypto space
biography: Jackson Palmer, who co-created Dogecoin as a tongue-in-cheek experiment, later distanced himself from the project, becoming a vocal critic of cryptocurrency’s speculative mania.

long_term_goal: Leverage market expertise to shape global crypto trading strategies
short_term_goal: Reestablish credibility after Three Arrows Capital’s liquidation
biography: Su Zhu built Three Arrows Capital into a significant crypto hedge fund known for its bold, heavily leveraged plays. However, market downturns and fund mismanagement led to a high-profile collapse.

long_term_goal: Reinvent hedge fund operations to endure market volatility
short_term_goal: Explore new avenues in DeFi and capital ventures post-crisis
biography: Kyle Davies co-founded Three Arrows Capital, partnering with Su Zhu to execute major crypto trades. He now seeks to rebuild in the aftermath of the fund’s collapse by exploring new ventures.
